p: Flavonoids prevent age related neurodegenerative diseases, and in particular, dementia [ 151, 152], Parkinson’s [ 153, 154, 155] and Alzheimer’s disease [ 156, 157, 158]. The ROS and nitrogen species (NOCs) have roles in many neurodegenerative diseases. Tangeretin, a flavonoid found in citrus fruits, acts as an antioxidant against ROS and NOCs species and provides protection in neurodegeneration disorders such as Parkinson’s disease [ 159].
